tootip.srparasites.lurecomp.1: Chunks of a Rupter body, harvested from the small Parasite. A Lure Component.
tootip.srparasites.lurecomp.2: A grossly swollen organ harvested from an Assimilated Creature. A Lure Component.
tootip.srparasites.lurecomp.3: A chunk of skin harvested from a Primitive Parasite body, which excretes a horrible smell. A Lure Component.
tootip.srparasites.lurecomp.4: An organ harvested from an Adapted Parasite body, which excretes a horrible smell. A Lure Component.
tootip.srparasites.lurecomp.5: A mushroom looking organ harvested from a Pure Parasite body. A Lure Component.
tootip.srparasites.lurecomp.6: A spine-like object harvested from �. A Lure Component.
tootip.srparasites.item.1: A small sphere which seems to emit Energy, harvested from an Adapted Summoner. A Crafting Ingredient for Weapons Components.
tootip.srparasites.item.2: A sturdy bone harvested from an Adapted Yelloweye. A Crafting Ingredient for Weapons Components.
tootip.srparasites.item.3: A small orb which seems to emit Energy, harvested from an Adapted Manducater. A Crafting Ingredient for Weapons Components.
tootip.srparasites.item.4: A sharp fang harvested from an Adapted Reeker. A Crafting Ingredient for Weapons Components.
tootip.srparasites.item.5: A light yet resistant armor fragment harvested from the Adapted Longarms. A Crafting ingredient for Weapons Components.
tootip.srparasites.item.6: A piece of flesh ripped off an Assimilated Creature. A Lure Component that can also be used as Sustainment, in the most desperate situations.
tootip.srparasites.item.8: An elastic and organic material, produced from Parasites body parts. A Component for Weapons.
tootip.srparasites.item.9: A piece of a blade, produced from Parasites body parts. A Component for Weapons.
tootip.srparasites.item.10: The flame of life has not yet shined in this object. The Core that fuels all Weapons.
tootip.srparasites.item.11: An extremely resistant shell, produced from Parasites body parts. A Component for Weapons.
tootip.srparasites.item.12: A particularly thick bone, produced from Parasites body parts. A Component for Weapons.
tootip.srparasites.item.14: It�s smooth on the touch. A Component of the Bow.
tootip.srparasites.item.15: It�s smooth on the touch. A Component of the Bow.
tootip.srparasites.item.16: Really elastic. A Component of the Bow.
tootip.srparasites.item.17: It�s pulsating. A Component of the Bow.
tootip.srparasites.weaponm.1: Result of various Parasites body parts reshaped to form a Weapon. The flame of life shines inside it.
tootip.srparasites.weaponm.2: The ulterior Evolution of the Living Scythe. It has gained a Mind.
tootip.srparasites.weaponm.3: Result of various Parasites body parts reshaped to form a Weapon. The flame of life shines inside it.
tootip.srparasites.weaponm.4: The ulterior Evolution of the Living Axe. It has gained a Mind.
tootip.srparasites.weaponm.5: Result of various Parasites body parts reshaped to form a Weapon. The flame of life shines inside it.
tootip.srparasites.weaponm.6: The ulterior Evolution of the Living Sword. It has gained a Mind.
tootip.srparasites.weaponm.7: Result of various Parasites body parts reshaped to form a Weapon. The flame of life shines inside it.
tootip.srparasites.weaponm.8: The ulterior Evolution of the Living Cleaver. It has gained a Mind.
tootip.srparasites.weaponr.1: Result of various Parasites body parts reshaped to form a Weapon. The flame of life shines inside it.
tootip.srparasites.weaponr.2: The ulterior Evolution of the Living Bow. It has gained a Mind.
